kDesc
It's the classic living room set! Includes the Sofa, Fainting Chair, Rug, Table, Side Table, China Cabinet and Wingback Chair.[#Legal]
Un pack classique pour le salon. Comprend un canapé, une méridienne, un tapis, une table, un guéridon, un vaisselier et un fauteuil.[#Legal]
Das klassische Wohnzimmer-Set! Enthält Sofa, Liegesofa, Teppich, Couchtisch, Beistelltisch, Geschirrschrank und Lehnstuhl.[#Legal]
Ecco il pacchetto salotto classico! Include divano, chaise longue, tappeto, tavolino da caffè, comodino e poltroncina. [#Legal]
¡El conjunto de cuarto de estar clásico! Incluye sofá, chaise longe, alfombra, mesa, mesa auxiliar, vitrina y butaca.[#Legal]
It's the classic living room set! Includes the Sofa, Fainting Chair, Rug, Table, Side Table, China Cabinet and Wingback Chair.[#Legal]
클래식 거실 팩입니다! 클래식 소파, 긴 소파, 양탄자, 커피 탁자, 테이블, 그리고 윙백 의자를 포함합니다.[#Legal]
It's the classic living room set! Includes the Sofa, Fainting Chair, Rug, Table, Side Table, China Cabinet and Wingback Chair.[#Legal]
這款古典客廳組合包，包括古典沙發、古典長椅、古典地毯、古典咖啡桌、古典小桌子及古典翼背椅。[#Legal]
